entity.name: Organization_relationship
entity.description:
ISO/DIS 10303-41:1999(E) A relationship between two or more organizations on a range of products, services or projects.
For different types of organization relationships, see the reference data.
supply relationship (supplier-customer), partner relationship (partner-partner), contracting relationship (contractor, subcontractor)

explicit.name: description
explicit.description: The text that characterizes the relationship.

explicit.name: related_organization
explicit.description: The subordinate organization in the relationship.

explicit.name: relating_organization
explicit.description: The superior organization in the relationship.

explicit.name: relationship_type
explicit.description: The label by which the relationship is known.

entity.name: Organization_type
entity.description:
An organization is a recognized kind of organization. It enables organizations to be assigned to tasks.
change control board, sales organization, manufacturing organization, project team

explicit.name: description
explicit.description: The text that characterizes the type of orgainization.

explicit.name: name
explicit.description: The label by which the type of organization is known.
